sn45.33:1.2: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the noble eightfold path has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn45.33:1.3: Whoever has undertaken the noble eightfold path has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn45.33:1.4: And what is the noble eightfold path?
sn45.33:1.5: It is right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.33:1.6: Whoever has missed out on the noble eightfold path has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn45.33:1.7: Whoever has undertaken the noble eightfold path has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.”
